ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hey there everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: Wb to the family. I play mostly on the Saryrn Server myself the following are my chars that I have Halyburton Bearhugger 52 Barb Shammy Illicon 16 HiElf
ygData.messageBody:
Wb to the family.

I play mostly on the Saryrn Server myself the following are my chars that I
have

Halyburton Bearhugger 52 Barb Shammy
Illicon 16 HiElf Chanter
Doktari 11 HiElf Cleric
Qapmoc 11 Half Elf Ranger
Mittion 7 Human Pally

I also actually do have a lvl 4 Dorf Pally named Targonicus on the Seventh
Hammer that I rarely play but a RL friend of mine here in jax Fl wanted to
get rid of some stuff and felt that as a Christmas present he would twink
out a pally for me

Claude known to my RL friends as Kwasi

----- Original Message -----
From: <Thunder_Cat_4283@...>


> I'm back everyone. The last time I was a part of this group, I was
> driven away due to a misunderstanding. After that, the owner and I
> have made some-what of a friendship and I decided to give the group
> another try. It is, after all, the only decent EverQuest group at
> Yahoo! and I was disappointed that I had to leave in the first
> place. So, I'm glad to be back. First comes first, what servers do
> you all play on?
>
> -= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
> -= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
> -= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
